game.name: 水浒：八方枭雄
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, Steam 턴 알림, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유, Steam 타임라인
game.shortDescription: A turn based strategy game based on the story of Water Margin, where players operate multiple heroes from one of the eight major factions to battle against different units and enemy factions. Defeat opponents through various strategies such as terrain, hero skills, combinations, traps, etc.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A turn based strategy game based on the story of Water Margin, where players operate multiple heroes from one of the eight major factions to battle against different units and enemy factions. Defeat opponents through various strategies such as terrain, hero skills, combinations, traps, etc.
